kissing.csv

[download data]

This data frame contains one variable (columns):

  • side - preference of side couples turn their heads to when kissing (left or right)

Reference: Güntürkün, Onur. “Human behaviour: adult persistence of head-turning asymmetry.” Nature 421.6924 (2003): 711-711.
